message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair.
Let's be practical, Alice.  I'm feeling generous today, so you get a decent share.
I'll take a slightly lower share this time, but I'm not willing to be taken advantage of. Let's find a middle ground, Bob.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. My offer stands. It's a good deal, take it or leave it.
Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but I can't accept an offer that leaves me with less than 40% in this round. Let's make this work.
